identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% luxury airport e-commerce experience that feels like a First Class Loungeâ€”exclusive, seamless, and emotionally resonant.

key_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Airport Utility with High-Fashion Editorial.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a VIP service.
Content is King: Products are the heroes; UI is the stage.
Negative Space: Generous padding to signal luxury (Time = Space).

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Brand names

mono.usage: Order numbers, Flight codes, SKU details

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600;700&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;0,700;1,400&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap');

usage_rules: Primary color (#0F172A) is for 'Buy Now' and primary actions only.
Secondary color (#F5E6D3) is for Loyalty Points and 'Gold' member accents.
Backgrounds should be #FAFAF9 (Warm Grey) to avoid clinical white sterility.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden bg-card hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-500 border-none

inputs.default: h-12 bg-transparent border-b border-input rounded-none px-0 focus-visible:ring-0 focus-visible:border-primary transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

navigation.wrapper: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-border/40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.

Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings to give it that Vogue/Editorial look. Ensure the 'Customer Journey' feels like a VIP serviceâ€”smooth, animated, and beautiful. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not deviate from the font choices.
